name: Metal Turtle
description:
Fun fact: did you know that gold is repelled by magnets? well this game is about that! Metal Turtle is a plataformer game where you play as a turtle that has a tank and needs to complete puzzles and use magnetism to escape a metal factory... for some reason... 

Esc - Close                R - Restart level

this was made for the weekly game jam 248 but wasn't published in time (literally 2 seconds later)
